metadata.title: CVE-2021-28091 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Lasso all versions prior to 2.7.0 has improper verification of a cryptographic signature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-28091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblasso-perl - 2.6.1-3
liblasso3 - 2.6.1-3
python3-lasso - 2.6.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lasso package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-3').
